experience: You and Russ both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Matt Greene, and 81 others

In Tennessee, we have launched the Availability Stack by Presidio, Nimble, HPE and VEEAM. It's a datacenter on wheels! Who wants an IT mini fridge?! Jaime Hardwick Bryan Turner Chad Holcomb Mike Rouch
Daniel Bizo & 451 Group know their Edge Infrastructure.

Instant Data Centers (IDC) engineers IT rack level enclosures that include: cooling, active fire suppression, security, mobility, and scalability.  We are an all-in-one, turnkey solution for deploying a data center anywhere. We manufacture our products to NEMA 4 meaning that we can withstand just about any weather, any location and thrive. We are true edge infrastructure; we enable users to put compute power as close to the edge as they want.

My responsibilities are to bring Elliptical Mobile Solutions (EMS) back to market from an 18-month hiatus.  My company, Instant Data Centers (IDC) has purchased EMS out of Chapter 11 bankruptcy.  The acquisition included the patents that were issued to EMS for it's prized and innovative product line of rack level ruggedized micro-modular data centers (MMDC). I am very excited to bring EMS back to the market and to start delivering the desired backlog of orders.  Manufacturing has started and IDC is 100% ready to deliver.

Passion is driving new business with Avisolve.  Working with partners, vendors and manufacturers to strengthen relationships to deliver better, best of breed solutions to our customers. Avisolve is a growing company that is excelling in providing solutions to our customers by utilizing our major brand connections, engineers and thought leaders.   Bleeding edge on a comfortable level and on today's budget.

Management and long term strategic growth of top accounts representing more than $4.3 million in annual sales. A core focus on consultative and technical sales to drive client assets and portfolio supporting long-term growth. Conceptualize, design, present and support clients in developing domain aftermarket strategy supporting portfolio growth and expansion, as well as improve web presence, SEO, SEM and customized analytics. Member of senior sales team defining and launching national and global sales vision and new product/service offerings.

Lead sales representative with strategic and business management accountability for sales, marketing, account management.  Worked within the business channel to drive sales both direct and indirect through the channel.  Delivered growth from 450k to 3.5 million in the first year.

December 14, 2016, Russ worked with Mike Lehrer but at different companies

I had the pleasure of working with Mike over the past several years. Mike is the reason that when I was the VP Business Development at Avisolve we signed with Kaminario.  Mike is unique in that he is very technical but also understands the sales side of the business. He is equally comfortable leading a sales call or being the sales engineer, supporting the account exec. That is truly a unique set of skills. In addition, Mike is very comfortable speaking in front of crowds and is very well liked by his peers. He'd be an asset to any organization.

Keith is an excellent marketer. You need someone like Keith who will continuously expand his education and be looking for the next method to deliver your messaging to your consumers.  Keith finds platforms I have never heard of, educates himself and others.  Keith then works hard to test and show you results.  At the end of the day, results are what matters and Keith delivers desirable results.

summary: Excited to be blending all of my skills at my dream job. My father owned, operated, manufactured fireplaces in the Pacific Northwest.  He was successful in patenting a new fireplace technology based on an innovative airflow process that became his award-winning Fireplace Xtrordinair. I spent thousands of hours working alongside him in my youth, absorbing knowledge and his energy.  I loved to work with my hands, but I happened to shine in IT as well.  I went to school and graduated with a degree in Computer Science & Business Administration MIS.  I went to work in San Francisco for a financial market data provider where I learned a lot about the financial markets and high-frequency data providers.  I then moved to the internet powerhouse, GoDaddy.com where I became educated on the entirety of the web, plus how to work with Fortune 500 companies.  From there I was one of 3 innovators who started Avisolve, an Arizona Technology Broker as VP of Business Development. There I successfully cultivated many of the large and small vendor relationships.  Now I am CTO at Instant Data Centers, LLC (IDC).  We design & manufacture edge infrastructure solutions for the data center.   The Edge Infrastructures are Micro Data Centers at the rack level which includes cooling and all features you'd see in a traditional large-scale data center.  In a significant step, IDC has purchased Elliptical Mobile Systems (EMS), and I am excited that we at IDC have already integrated the entire product line, patents, and manufacturing process.  IDC has come to market now with innovative new designs and now proven products from EMS.  The Micro Data Center space is a very exciting place to be right now, and with my leadership, IDC will be a major player.  Today our most prominent market are Natural Resources (Mining, Construction & Oil & Gas), Government & Telecommunications.
name: Russ Dailey
title: Enabling computing power by the creation of edge infrastructure
